snippet: Flavia Pennetta of Italy beat Klara Koukalova of the Czech Republic, 6-1, 6-3, during the first round of the Connecticut Open in New Haven.
lead_paragraph: Flavia Pennetta of Italy beat Klara Koukalova of the Czech Republic, 6-1, 6-3, during the first round of the Connecticut Open in New Haven.

headline.content_kicker: Sports Briefing | England beat Canada, 21-9, to win the womens Rugby World Cup in Paris. The victory ended Englands run of three straight defeats in Cup finals.  (AGENCE FRANCE-PRESSE)  Tennis
